about_the_game:
This book goes beyond what is included in the game, containing additional information and revealing secrets. It serves as both a companion guide to Swansong and a supplement for the rules of the Vampire: The Masquerade pen-and-paper role-playing game.

Written by Matthew Dawkins.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes intense violence, blood and gore, including decapitation, dismemberment and torture. It also contains content of a sexual nature, partial nudity, coarse language and references to drug use.
